action.name: Hoopak
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/160 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if the kender used the hoopak's sling to make a ranged attack.

action.name: Taunt
entries: The kender launches a barrage of insults at a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If the target can hear the kender, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Elusive
entries: The kender takes the Disengage or Hide action.
